title: Forlorn
description: Tyler Brant, a young knight is called upon to slay his first dragon. His father fought beasts of many sizes and shapes and the queen is certain heâ€™ll have no problems with this battle. Upon meeting the mighty dragon, Orpheus-the two form an unlikely friendship and before they know it, become lovers. Meanwhile, corruption is not far behind within the castle walls, the knight and dragon are inevitably going to set off a chain of events that will change our perception of humans and creatures throughout the entire kingdom.
author: J.A.  Flynn
